text: Python and indentation, having touble getting started
I have just started learning python and am getting caught up.
I come from mostly C background.

code:
class Alarm:

    def timer():

    def main():
    	print ("Timer has Started")

    main()

text: I always get a silly error when I try to run this code::

code:
alarm > python alarm.py 
  File "alarm.py", line 5
    def main():
      ^
IndentationError: expected an indented block
